title: Why was i chat restricted? (Any Opinion Welcome)
body:
Chat restricted for 24 games for responding to a troll? This player made threats to my life and used every diss he could think of to get me tilted. Including toxic comments about Americans and dying in ww3, accusing all Americans of being drug addicts, all Americans being fat, all Americans being dumb, hoping China drops a bomb on me, etc. I wasn't nice to the troll but i could have responded way worse. So basically Riot is telling players that if someone is threatening you and you respond will be chat restricted? Really confused by this move on Riots part. If anyone has advice or another opinion please let me know.

> if someone is threatening you

You really aren't in a position to be threatened most the time. 

There are only a few ways they threaten you. Physical threats like "I'll come to your house and beat you up" or threats to your digital account like "I will report you and you will get banned". 

I wouldn't worry too much about the physical threats as most people won't execute what they say, but if you do truely fear for your life, please contact your local authorities. 

The digital threat is just an empty threat if you didn't do anything wrong. All a report does is to flag the system to review the reported player, and it will return a toxicity score (0 for no toxicity found, 100 for severe toxicity found). When a player passes a certain accumulated toxicity score, they will get punished by the system. So if you didn't do anything wrong, then their threats mean nothing. 

In both cases you can report them for harassment. But remember, the key is to not give any reason for their reports to be true against you. When you also call for reports (remember, it's a digital threat) or you accuse other's of inting/trolling, you are also harassing others and it will count towards your total toxicity score.
Thanks!
